Very solid food.  Probably closer to 3.5.  This was the first restaurant we ate at when arrived as we had rented an apartment and it was not ready yet.  After 10 days here I finally can say we can review it and comfortably say it was very good food mainly visited by locals.  We sat outside and had the snails and some other tapas.  I'm not craving to go back, but if in the area it is an excellent choice.
